com.quasar.controller

Class GolangController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quasar.controller.GolangController

  • @RestController
public class GolangController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    emmanuel

      Constructors

      GolangController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> encrypt(java.lang.String text)
      Endpoint that encode a text string.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> topsecret(TopSecretRequest topSecretRequest)
      Endpoint that receives a list of satellites and mathematically calculates the coordinates and the secret message sent by the imperial cargo carrier, in case the position cannot be calculated, it returns an http status 404.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> topsecretSplit()
      Endpoint that mathematically calculates the coordinates and the secret message sent by the imperial cargo carrier, only if you have the information of the 3 satellites [Kenobi, Skywalker and Sato], registered in the endpoint "/topsecret_split/{satellite_name}".
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> topsecretSplit(java.lang.String satelliteName, Satellite satellite)
      Endpoint that receives only one satellite and stores it in the database, in case of success, it returns an http status 200, in case of error, it returns an http status 404.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • topsecret

        @PostMapping(value="/topsecret")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> topsecret(@RequestBody
                                                                                             TopSecretRequest topSecretRequest)
        Endpoint that receives a list of satellites and mathematically calculates the coordinates and the secret message sent by the imperial cargo carrier, in case the position cannot be calculated, it returns an http status 404.
        Parameters:
        topSecretRequest - Object that contains a list of satellites, which contain the name of the satellite to which it is directed, the distance to the satellite, and the incomplete string arrangement of the message.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with the coordinates and the constructed message.

      • topsecretSplit

        @PostMapping(value="/topsecret_split/{satellite_name}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> topsecretSplit(@PathVariable(value="satellite_name")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String satelliteName,
                                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                                         Satellite satellite)
        Endpoint that receives only one satellite and stores it in the database, in case of success, it returns an http status 200, in case of error, it returns an http status 404.
        Parameters:
        satelliteName - Name of the satellite to which it is directed.
        satellite - Object containing the distance to the satellite, and the incomplete string array of the message.
        Returns:
        Empty ResponseEntity with http status.

      • topsecretSplit

        @GetMapping(value="/topsecret_split")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> topsecretSplit()
        Endpoint that mathematically calculates the coordinates and the secret message sent by the imperial cargo carrier, only if you have the information of the 3 satellites [Kenobi, Skywalker and Sato], registered in the endpoint "/topsecret_split/{satellite_name}".
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with the coordinates and the constructed message.

      • encrypt

        @PostMapping(value="/encrypt")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> encrypt(@RequestParam
                                                                                         java.lang.String text)
        Endpoint that encode a text string.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to encode.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with the encoded text.
